trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events that render the background of objects derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> class.

The ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs class provides data for the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderButtonBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderDropDownButtonBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderLabelBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderMenuItemBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderOverflowButtonBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderSplitButtonBackground> In addition, it provides data for the following methods: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawButtonBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawDropDownButtonBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawItemBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawLabelBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawMenuItemBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawOverflowButtonBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawSplitButton%2A>

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> and using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the item.
Gets the graphics used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to paint.
If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is in the overflow area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the ToolStrip property returns an empty string.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that is the owner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
